text: The WAGR Ds class were a total of 19 steam locomotives operated by the Western Australian Government Railways (WAGR) from 1931 to 1964. The D class were the result of fitting superheated boilers to the standard D class, this was done to all but 1 from 1931. Withdrawals started in 1953 with the last scrapped and withdrawn in 1965. Category:Western Australian Government Railways locomotives
title: WAGR Ds class
